items.title: Todd Combs Leaves Berkshire To Lead JPMorgan’s Newly Launched Strategic Investment Group
items.description: Under the new structure, Todd A. Combs, who has led GEICO since 2020, will leave Berkshire Hathaway to join JPMorgan Chase.
